titleStmt.title: Jovis decimo die Octobris, 1700, annoq. regni Regis Willielmi Tertii ... upon reading the humble petition of the inhabitants and shopkeepers in and about Exchange-alley in Cornhill ... it is ordered that none of the Exchange-brokers do for the future agitate any business between merchant and merchant, or others in the open alley ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Levett Mayor.
Second part of title taken from text.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
